subtitle: Paste a supplier string and let our AI agents extract, verify, and format product data for any marketplace.
search_placeholder: Enter supplier string (e.g., 'HP CE505X Black LaserJet Toner 80A')
bulk_upload: Or upload CSV for bulk processing

features.extraction_desc: Automatically extract MPN, brand, and specs from any supplier string
features.verification_desc: Cross-reference data from official sites, marketplaces, and PDFs
features.realtime_desc: Watch agents work in real-time with full transparency
